ComicInfo.Tags: Ed Sullivan,Buck Rogers,Jughead Jones,Hans Katzenjammer,Dennis the Menace,Nancy,Fritz Katzenjammer,Henry,Blackhawk Squadron,Ulysses S. Grant,Abraham Lincoln,Sir Galahad,Dur Captain,Alfred E. Neuman,Little Lulu,Sluggo
ComicInfo.Title: The Race is on for the Super Guided Missile; Comic Books [Black And Blue Hawks!]; The Life of General Homer T. 'Old Hominy' Shotbag; Talk; Rare Old Cartoons; Million Dollar Horse; Medical
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Race is on for the Super Guided Missile: Shows various parts of the space race between the US and USSR, with ultimate consequences of missile use.
Comic Books [Black And Blue Hawks!]: The Black And Blue Hawks stage a mutiny.
The Life of General Homer T. 'Old Hominy' Shotbag: Highlights of the life of Civil War general Homer T. Shotbag, from childhood to fame.
Talk: Comparisons of what you think overseen conversations are, with what they actually are.
Rare Old Cartoons: Man has trouble with a tube of glue.
Million Dollar Horse: Story of a celebrity race horse, showing the care taken with him versus the poor working conditions of his caretakers.
Medical: Lance needs a tonsillectomy, from which he recovers in great shape, but still can't play the violin well.
ComicInfo.Writer: Al Jaffee,Harvey Kurtzman,Ed Fischer,Henry Mayo Bateman
ComicInfo.Penciller: Al Jaffee,Jack Davis,Wally Wood,Ed Fischer,Seltz,Henry Mayo Bateman,Bill Elder
ComicInfo.Inker: Al Jaffee,Jack Davis,Wally Wood,Ed Fischer,Seltz,Henry Mayo Bateman,Bill Elder
